record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 9:30 A.M. TOMORROW
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 9:30 A.M. TOMORROW -- (Senate - September 05, 2007)

[Page: S11127]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is no further business today, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand in adjournment under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 7:59 p.m., adjourned until Thursday, September 6, 2007, at 9:30 a.m.
